channel.title: Skills all 99?
channel.description: Why are my skills all 99, when I train it says theiving lvl 5--- but it still shows 99/99.. Every stat is like that.. Can you please tell me how to fix?

item.title: Skills all 99?
item.dc:creator: @1210saad 1210saad
item.description:
@1210saad wrote:

I have the same problem

Read full topic

item.title: Skills all 99?
item.dc:creator: @yuk yuk
item.description:
@yuk wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:11, topic:524620”][quote author=yuk link=topic=643254.msg4330290#msg4330290 date=1373561197]

maybe becauswhen you level it probably doesnt refresh the skill level on skill tab.

But why would all new accounts start out at maxed everything?
[/quote]
Go into playerassistant.java
Search “Starter”
and look for something like this:

(int skill = 0; skill < 7; skill++) { c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill);
Enjoy.[/quote]
I did it, it found starter but it does not look anything like that, this is what it looks like around it…

public boolean checkForFlags() {
	int[][] itemsToCheck = {{995,100000000},{35,5},{667,5},{2402,5},{746,5},{4151,150},{565,100000},{560,100000},{555,300000},{11235,10}};
	for (int j = 0; j < itemsToCheck.length; j++) {
		if (itemsToCheck[j][1] < c.getItems().getTotalCount(itemsToCheck[j][0]))
			return true;		
	}
	return false;
}

public void addStarter() {
	c.trade11 = 900;
	c.getItems().addItem(995,5000000);
	c.getItems().addItem(1725,1);
	c.getItems().addItem(554,1000);
	c.getItems().addItem(555,100);
	c.getItems().addItem(556,1000);
	c.getItems().addItem(558,1000);
	c.getItems().addItem(560,100);
	c.getItems().addItem(565,100);
	c.getItems().addItem(564, 1000);
	c.getItems().addItem(1323,1);
	c.getItems().addItem(841,1);
	c.getItems().addItem(882,150);
	c.getItems().addItem(392,500);
	c.getItems().addItem(380,3000);

Read full topic

item.title: Skills all 99?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

why is that even in the starter lol…if your levelUp method starts immediately… your starter would only recognize you for the first time/first login on that name wouldn’t it?

Read full topic

item.title: Skills all 99?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“yuk, post:3, topic:524620”][quote author=Driman Rune link=topic=643254.msg4330285#msg4330285 date=1373560987]
maybe becauswhen you level it probably doesnt refresh the skill level on skill tab.
[/quote]

But why would all new accounts start out at maxed everything?[/quote]
Go into playerassistant.java
Search “Starter”
and look for something like this:

(int skill = 0; skill < 7; skill++) { c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill);
Enjoy.

Read full topic
